src_original: śuddha sarvārtha śuddhārtha dānacarya namo 'stu te // 6 //
dāna pradana dānāgrya tyāga tyāgāgrya dāyaka /
tgt_original: dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgāgrya dāyaka |

src_original: tathāgata mahāketo mahāhāsa namo 'stu te // 10 //  tathāgatābhiṣekāgrya mahābhiṣeka mahāvibho /
tgt_original: tathāgata mahāketo mahāhāsa namo'stu te || 10 ||  tathāgatābhiṣekājña mahābhiṣeka mahāvibho |

src_original: a[bhva]grya vyāpi sarvātma varaprada mahāvara /  vibhūte sarvasaṃpatte vajragarbha namo 'stu te // 15 //
tgt_original: abhvagrya vyāpi sarvātma varaprada mahāvara |  vibhūte sarvasaṃpatte vajragarbhaṃ namo'stu te || 15 ||
